system.description:
Summons monsters to do the character’s bidding.

  • 1st level monsters: Expending a charge summons [[/r 2d4]] 1st level monsters.

  • 2nd level monsters: Expending 2 charges summons [[/r 1d6]] 2nd level monsters.

  • 3rd level monsters: Expending 3 charges summons [[/r 1d4]] 3rd level monsters.

  • Type of monsters: The referee should randomly determine the type of monsters which are summoned, for example using dungeon wandering monster tables.

  • Arrival time: Summoned monsters arrive at the character’s location in [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

  • Commanding: Monsters will attack enemies as directed or, if the character can communicate with them, be given other tasks.

  • Duration: The monsters disappear after 1 round per level of the character.
